park_id: # Manual Tier Overrides for Ride Classification System
# Purpose: Highest-priority classification source (Priority 1) that bypasses all automated classification.
#   - Handle unique rides that don't fit standard criteria
#   - Override tier changes due to refurbishment/closure
#   date_added (DATE): YYYY-MM-DD format when override was added
# Classification Confidence: 1.00 (manual overrides are always confidence=1.0)
# Example Entries (commented out - add actual overrides below):

reason: Space Mountain is signature Magic Kingdom attraction despite AI underestimating
Dumbo classified as Tier 2 but wait times show Tier 3 pattern
AI overestimated importance - average wait times under 15 minutes

park_id: # - Overrides take precedence over exact_matches.json and pattern_matcher
# - Changes take effect on next classification_service.classify() call
